p:
We analyzed simulation output from five 50-member LEs: ALL, SV, AERO, OZONE, and GHG. For the first 4 ensembles, CanESM2 was run over the 1950 to 2005 period with forcing by ALL, SV, AERO, and OZONE. After 2005 each of these 4 numerical experiments continued with the forcing appropriate for that ensemble from the Representative Concentration Pathway 8.5 (RCP8.5) scenario ( 38). The ALL, AERO, and OZONE LEs end in 2100; the SV ensemble ends in 2020 ( 3 â€“ 5). Initialization of individual members for these 4 ensembles is described in
SI Appendix .
